official_title: To amend the Demonstration Cities and Metropolitan Development Act of 1966 to extend the assistance program for homeowners adversely affected by base closures to employees of a nonappropriated fund instrumentality of the Department of Defense.

summary.text: Amends the Demonstration Cities and Metropolitan Development Act of 1966 to extend the assistance program for homeowners adversely affected by base closures to employees of a Defense Department nonappropriated fund instrumentality.
